title: The Draymond Green Show - Warriors Go Up 3-0, Heat-Celtics Predictions, and Mailbag Questions
itunes:title: The Draymond Green Show - Warriors Go Up 3-0, Heat-Celtics Predictions, and Mailbag Questions
description:
Draymond Green discusses the Warriors beating the Mavericks in Game 3 to take a 3-0 series lead in the Western Conference Finals, what he expects from a pivotal Game 4 in the Eastern Conference Finals, and answers mailbag questions. #Herd

Produced by: Jackson Safon

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
